page.title: 13PUPIL'S CHOICES,MUTHILL
page.content: {18th June 1985.} Classes Primary 4 to 7 at Muthill Primary School held a discussion about their favourite {Pop group,T.V. {Programme, Musical Instrument and {Author.}These are the results as reported by Hilary Teale, age 11. {Pop Groups. Wham! }was by far the most popular, followed by {Status Quo, {Beatles,} and {Slade.} {T.V.Programmes. That's My Boy,Dynasty and{The Young Ones }were the favourites. Next in popularity were { {Only Fools and Horses}and {Cat's Eyes. Also mentioned were{Cover Up, {Streethawk, Knight Rider, Minder,Winds {of War, Dallas,Gentle Ben, Eastenders. My favourite musical instruments are the {French Horn }and{Bassoon. My favourite authors are {Ruby {Ferguson }and {Enid Blyton.
